Understate: The claim underplays the actions taken by the Obama administration against Fox News, such as surveilling one of their reporters and excluding them from interviews.
Falters at times: The claim is not entirely accurate as it fails to acknowledge the actions taken by the Obama administration against Fox News.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or examples to support the statement that Obama never threatened to shut down Fox News or call them enemies of the people.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that complaining about Fox News is the only way to threaten the freedom of the press, disregarding other actions taken by the Obama administration.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation to the claim, as the Obama administration did take action against Fox News, even if they did not explicitly use the terms "shut them down" or "enemies of the people."
